text: Teri Montefusco is a gymnast from USA. Montefusco competed at the 1960 Summer Olympics. She was born on 18 June 1941.Teri Montefusco == References == Category:1941 births Category:Living people Category:American gymnasts Category:Olympians for the United States Category:Sportspeople from Peoria, Illinois
title: Teri Montefusco
